short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to use Instagram more effectively

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost your Instagram productivity with Instagram Copilot, the ultimate Chrome extension for power users. Seamlessly scrape followers and effortlessly interact with content on autopilot, saving you valuable time and effort. Download captivating pictures and videos with just one click, making content curation a breeze. Plus, unlock the ability to effortlessly record Instagram Live videos, preserving memorable moments in an instant. Maximize your Instagram presence and streamline your social media strategy with Instagram Copilot, your all-in-one solution for efficient Instagram management.
